    I

    ImportantDay - Class in cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model
    This class is a superclass for Anniversary, Birthday, and Occasion It contains the common attributes: name, description, and date, and the common methods: getName, getDescription, getDate, getType, toString It also contains a static method: sortDaysByDates, which sorts the list of ImportantDay by date
    ImportantDay(String, String, LocalDate) - Constructor for class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model.ImportantDay
    Constructor for ImportantDay
    importantDays - Static variable in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.LoadAndSave
    A list that stores all important days

    This class is for the main program of the important days tracker
    ImportantDaysTracker() - Constructor for class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.ImportantDaysTracker
    This is the constructor of the ImportantDaysTracker class

    L

    listAllDays() - Static method in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.ImportantDaysTracker
    This method is for listing all the days in the list
    listByTypeThisYear(String) - Static method in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.ImportantDaysTracker
    This orders the days by type and year, store them in a new arrayList: sameTypeThisYear Pops up a dialog if no days to be shown Display the filtered days
    listPassedDaysThisYear() - Static method in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.ImportantDaysTracker
    This method is for listing the passed days this year Pops up a dialog if no passed days to be shown
    listUpcomingDaysThisYear() - Static method in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.ImportantDaysTracker
    This method is for listing the upcoming days this year Pops up a dialog if no upcoming days to be shown
    LoadAndSave - Class in cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control
    This class is responsible for loading and saving important days data to/from a JSON file.
    LoadAndSave() - Constructor for class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.LoadAndSave
    Default constructor
    loadFromFile() - Static method in class cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.control.LoadAndSave
    This method saves the list of important days to a JSON file Uses Gson to handle serialization of LocalDate and different ImportantDay subclasses The file is saved as "list.json" in the current directory Each important day is stored with its type, name, description, date and type-specific properties
